mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_EMAIL, M.MEM_ZIPCODE, M.MEM_ADDR1, M.MEM_ADDR2, M.MEM_HIREDATE, M.MEM_POSITION, M.MEM_RES, J.JG_NO, J.JG_NAME, D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M, TBL_JOBGROUP J, TBL_DEPT D WHERE M.JG_NO = J.JG_NO AND M.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO AND M.MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, J.JG_NAME ,M.MEM_POSITION, M.MEM_RES, M.MEM_HIREDATE FROM TBL_MEMBER M, TBL_JOBGROUP J, TBL_DEPT D WHERE M.JG_NO = J.JG_NO AND M.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO ORDER BY MEM_NO
